page.t: Courier which serves player infrastructure tasks
Courier which redistributes excess goods to other (trade) stations
Courier which serves supply and demand between two chosen stations
Courier which serves supply and demand between warehouse and multiple stations
Ship should be assigned directly to warehouse
Warehouse level to transfer to group 1 stations
Warehouse level to transfer to group 2 stations
Warehouse level to transfer to group 3 station
Ship should be assigned directly to source station
